fr.upmc.datacenter.dataprovider

Class DataProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.dataprovider.DataProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, DataProviderDispatcherI, DataProviderI, ComputerStateDataConsumerI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class DataProvider
extends fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
implements ComputerStateDataConsumerI, DataProviderI, DataProviderDispatcherI

    Class descriptor

    ComputerStateDataConsumerI defines the consumer side methods used to receive state data pushed by a computer, both static and dynamic. This component will store data ( Object java ) related to request dispatcher used on the data center provide data to controllers for cooperation, adaptation and informations about the network leader ( initiator ) and the whole topology hierarchy.
    Version:
    24.12.17.HK
    Author:
    Hacene KASDI
